room.name: The Great Chessboard Of Midgaard
room.description: You stand in the archway of the Chessboard of Midgaard. The giant wooden gate is rusted open. A narrow dirt path leads eastwards into the thick grass and the chessboard opens up to the west.

direction.general_description: A dirt path leads away through the great field north of Midgaard.
The huge chessboard opens up to the west.

room.name: A White Square
room.description: You are standing on a white marble square. This is usually the home of the Black Queen's Rook.

direction.general_description: A black square lies to the east.
A black square lies to the south.

room.name: The Black Treasury
room.description: You are standing in the treasury of the Black Court. Hopefully no one has looted the Crown's treasure.

direction.general_description: A small staircase rises above you.

room.name: The White Treasury
room.description: You are standing in the treasury of the White Court. Hopefully no one has looted the Crown's treasure.

direction.general_description: A small staircase rises above you.
